xwikidoc.content: licensor.name=Extension name licensor.status=Expiration date licensor.status.noLicenseAvailable=No license available licensor.status.infinite=Infinite licensor.actions=Actions licensor.trialLicense.label=Get Trial licensor.extendTrialLicense.label=Extend Trial licensor.paidLicense.label=Buy licensor.renewLicense.label=Renew licensor.addLicense.adding=Adding license... licensor.addLicense.success=License successfully added! licensor.addLicense.denied=Failed! You need administration right to add a license. licensor.addLicense.error=Failed! The provided license could not be decoded. licensor.addLicense.gettingTrialLicense=Getting trial license... licensor.addLicense.useless=Failed! License is not compatible or useful for your server. licensor.addLicense.heading=Add License licensor.addLicense.hint=Once you receive a License, copy it here to activate the Extension(s) it's associated with. licensor.ownerDetails.firstName.label=First name licensor.ownerDetails.lastName.label=Last name licensor.ownerDetails.email.label=Email licensor.ownerDetails.instanceId.label=Instance id licensor.ownerDetails.missingData=This field is required! licensor.ownerDetails.heading=License Ownership licensor.ownerDetails.hint=Fill in the following fields in order to buy a license or to get a trial one. licensor.licenseManager.heading=Licensed Extensions licensor.licenseManager.hint=Here's a list of extensions installed in your wiki that require a license to be activated.
